content.question: All of the terms listed could be used to illustrate what concept?

choices.label: Folk cultures responding to physical geography
Diffusion of cultural traits from Asia
Architectural adaptations to the natural environment

content.answer: Architectural adaptations to the natural environment

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe geographic concepts, processes, models, and theories.
